schema.title: Create a Web Application for Nx
schema.description: Create a web application using `swc` or `babel` as compiler.

directory.description: The directory of the new application.
directory.x-prompt: Which directory do you want to create the application in?

style.description: The file extension to be used for style files.

x-prompt.message: Which stylesheet format would you like to use?

bundler.x-prompt: Which bundler do you want to use?

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

unitTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for unit tests. Default value is 'jest' when using 'webpack' or 'none' as the bundler and 'vitest' when using 'vite' as the bundler

inSourceTests.description: When using Vitest, separate spec files will not be generated and instead will be included within the source files.

e2eTestRunner.x-prompt: Which E2E test runner would you like to use?
e2eTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for end to end (e2e) tests

tags.description: Add tags to the application (used for linting)

setParserOptionsProject.description: Whether or not to configure the ESLint `parserOptions.project` option. We do not do this by default for lint performance reasons.

strict.description: Creates an application with strict mode and strict type checking.

standaloneConfig.description: Split the project configuration into `<projectRoot>/project.json` rather than including it inside workspace.json
